document.full_text: china lifted bank reserve requirements by 50 basis points on thursday, signaling that containing inflation and soaking up excess cash remained its top priority even after signs the economy was slowing down.
document.title: china raises bank reserves again to tame inflation
lines_and_colors: china lifted bank reserve requirements by 50 basis points on thursday, signaling that containing inflation and soaking up excess cash remained its top priority even after signs the economy was slowing down.
